alert.note: Alert for Attala; Montgomery (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 4:05PM CDT until June 05 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Attala County in central Mississippi... South central Montgomery County in north central Mississippi... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 404 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Poplar Creek, or 12 miles east of Vaiden, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hesterville around 440 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
